caption: Four women raised their glasses in front of a Christmas tree. Inside an office, two women stood in front of a man, and a woman knocked on the corridor. The two of them entered the room, which was in a chaotic state with items strewn all over. The man was eating an apple. Later, a woman began cleaning the room. She kept talking to the man as she followed him around. The woman sat outside the man's door. The man opened the door again and handed a book to the woman. The woman brought the book to an office and gave it to a man at his desk. A man with a muscular build was playing badminton, and then a wedding scene appeared. A short-haired woman approached a man to strike up a conversation.

breakpoint.answer: The girl feels so sad that she cries.
